bblfish joined #xwiki at 14:57  
bblfish - (14:57): hello  
tapaya joined #xwiki at 14:58  
bblfish - (14:58): webid.myxwiki.org seems a bit slow  
bblfish - (14:58): is that just me?  
vmassol - (14:59): hey hi bblfish, long time no speak  
vmassol - (14:59): myxwiki.org was not responding this morning, let me check  
vmassol - (14:59): yes same now  
bblfish - (14:59): yes, I have been taking a philsophy holiday  
bblfish - (15:00): for a while, and talked in Reading, Manchester, Southampton, and next week in Oxford  
bblfish - (15:00): s/Reading/Kent/  
vmassol - (15:00): let me do a kill -3  
bblfish - (15:00): yes, myxwiki.org is slow too  
bblfish - (15:00): I was just about to do a screen cast :-)  
bblfish - (15:01): how is the openid stuff going?  
vmassol - (15:01): hey I was about to ask you the same question :)  
bblfish - (15:03): I was waiting to see if OpenId could be deployed on webid  
bblfish - (15:03): before I then try also to add webid login support  
vmassol - (15:05): restarting myxwiki.org now  
vmassol - (15:07): the dump looks ok  
vmassol - (15:07): maybe it was some connection issue between apache and tomcat  
bblfish - (15:09): is it working now?  
bblfish - (15:09): ah yes  
bblfish - (15:10): ok nice  
bblfish - (15:10): thanks  
vmassol - (15:10): np  
bblfish - (15:11): back to screen cast!  
vmassol - (15:12): good luck!  
bblfish1 joined #xwiki at 15:43

xwikibot joined #xwiki at 21:27  
vmassol - (21:27): @all: the bot was stopped, I've restarted it  
vmassol - (21:27): so it means xwiki.org was restarted  
bblfish - (21:29): does it say where the  new xar is?  
bblfish - (21:29): got it  
vmassol - (21:30): ok  
bblfish - (21:31): http://download.forge.objectweb.org/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator-2.3.xar  
vmassol - (21:31): bblfish: you don't need the XEM xar  
vmassol - (21:32): just the XE XAR  
bblfish - (21:32): ok http://download.forge.objectweb.org/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise-wiki-2.3.xar  
vmassol - (21:35): yes  
bblfish - (21:55): I forgot where the import is  
vmassol - (21:55): admin page  
vmassol - (21:55): you hover over the top left icon represneting your wiki  
vmassol - (21:56): (bblfish)  
bblfish - (21:56): ok  
vmassol - (21:57): direct link: http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/import/XWiki/Import?editor=globaladmin&section=Import  
bblfish - (21:57): oh  
bblfish - (21:57): I was not logged in as admin  
bblfish - (21:57): forgot that hjs is not admin here  
bblfish - (21:58): got it. thanks  
bblfish - (21:59): just swapping in all those memories  
vmassol - (21:59): neurons reconnecting… :)  
vmassol - (21:59): (but this shows we have room from improving our UI)  
vmassol - (21:59): UI  
bblfish - (22:00): yes, I can't remember what it said, but I suppose it could say You do not have XXX priviledges  
bblfish - (22:00): but perhaps it did  
vmassol - (22:00): it said you don't have the permissions to view that page  
bblfish - (22:02): ah, silly me then  
bblfish - (22:06): oh, vmassol you are editing the wiki?  
vmassol - (22:06): nope  
bblfish - (22:06): http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
bblfish - (22:06): it says object locked by some "Vincent Massol"  
vmassol - (22:06): you can force it  
bblfish - (22:06): ok  
bblfish - (22:07): I thought I'd better export everything first  
bblfish - (22:17): ok, did the install....  
vmassol - (22:19): bblfish: you sure you upgraded XWiki.XWikiUserPreferencesSheet ?  
bblfish - (22:19): There were a few I did not  
bblfish - (22:19): should I upgrade that one  
vmassol - (22:20): maybe you modified it  
vmassol - (22:20): I don't remember what you had modified  
bblfish - (22:20): To enable OpenId (which is now in the html) you also need to add the following lines to  the Presentation section of  
bblfish - (22:20):  the Preferences Panel  
bblfish - (22:20):     http://$%7Byourhost%7D/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
bblfish - (22:20):    #if($doc.getObject("XWiki.XWikiUsers"))  
bblfish - (22:20): <link rel="openid2.provider openid.server" href="http://openid4.me/index.php%22/>  
bblfish - (22:20):    #end  
bblfish - (22:21): should I upgrade it, and re-apply it?  
vmassol - (22:21): probably best indeed  
bblfish - (22:24): also XWikiPreferences?  
bblfish - (22:24): I just did PreferenceSheet  
bblfish - (22:30): now it does not look good at all  
bblfish - (22:30): http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/hjs  
bblfish - (22:34): well the diffs are useful at least  
florinciu left at 22:35 (Quit: Leaving.  
bblfish - (22:37): rolled back  
bblfish - (22:37): this is going to be some work again I see  
vmassol - (22:38): let me have a look  
bblfish - (22:39): no it's ok  
bblfish - (22:39): I lost the change with the doctype  
bblfish - (22:39): <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"  
bblfish - (22:39):     "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">  
bblfish - (22:39): it used to be rdfa  
bblfish - (22:40): <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML+RDFa 1.0//EN" "http://www.w3.org/MarkUp/DTD/xhtml-rdfa-1.dtd">  
bblfish - (22:40): I think I did not document that change...  
bblfish - (22:42): Do you remember which file needs to be changed for that?  
vmassol - (22:43): maybe you had a custom skin?  
vmassol - (22:43): yes tha must be it  
vmassol - (22:43): let me try something  
bblfish - (22:44): yes, only slight chnage  
bblfish - (22:44): I can find it and find the diff if I know the name  
vmassol - (22:44): hmmm  
vmassol - (22:44): we have a bug  
vmassol - (22:44): I can rollback http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DefaultSkin#History  
vmassol - (22:44): s/can/can't/  
vmassol - (22:44): ok i deleted the last version  
vmassol - (22:45): is it better now?  
vmassol - (22:45): (the html macro pb is still there but it's not related to the skin)  
bblfish - (22:45): yep it's back to rdfa  
bblfish - (22:47): ok, 5 errors in the rdfa parsing  
bblfish - (22:47): and I probably need to fix some of the html on the users page  
bblfish - (22:47): but I'll do that later, the library here in Oxford is closing  
vmassol - (22:48): ok  
bblfish - (22:49): thanks...  
bblfish - (22:49): for the help  
bblfish left at 22:51 (Quit: Leaving.  
jvdrean joined #xwiki at 22:56  
jvdrean left #xwiki at 22:56  
bblfish joined #xwiki at 23:13  
vmassol left at 23:13 (Quit: Leaving.  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 23:13  
florinciu left at 23:14 (Client Quit  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 23:38  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 23:41  
bblfish - (23:48): anyone still here?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:49): Hi.  
bblfish - (23:49): hi CalebJamesDeLisl  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:50): Sorry bblfish I really dropped the ball on writing up a new auth api.  
bblfish - (23:50): are you still intending on doing it?  
bblfish - (23:51): well perhaps you have an idea of where the problem lies for the bug here http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/hjs  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:52): I'd like to but to really do the job right we need new user objects.  
bblfish - (23:53): the above url gives me some macro error  
bblfish - (23:53): I am trying to locate where that would be coming from  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:53): There is desire to keep everything compatible with portlets which IMO is slowing down progress.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:53): Looking...  
bblfish - (23:53): It would help if the errors said which script they were stemming from  
bblfish - (23:54): ah ok (re portlets)  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:54): Yes. If you want to get foafssl running soon, I'd have to recommend you just implement this interface: http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/trunk/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/user/api/XWikiAuthService.java  
bblfish - (23:55): thanks  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:56): I want to try something can you give me ops?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:56): http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/aUser  
bblfish - (23:56): how do I do that?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:57): admin interface, click rights.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:57): Actually if you add me to the admin group that will work.  
bblfish - (23:57): where is that?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:58): upper left -> webid -> administor  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:58): You can try making the change if you don't want to trust me ;)  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:58): http://webid.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiUserSheet?viewer=code line 45 add a newline.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (23:58): (that's what I was going to do.)  
bblfish - (23:59): ok let me see  
bblfish - (23:59): was trying to add you,  
bblfish - (23:59): but if it's simple
